Package notification

Class Server

java.lang.Object
notification.Server
public class Server extends Object
The only public class in the package for now, it is the conductor of the alert service.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Map<String,Subscriber>
    abonnements
    Stores user subscriptions in the form (name, subscriber)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    Server()
    Server Constructor: Initializes the subscriber storage structure

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    adherer(String clientName, String mode, String adr)
    Method which adds a subscription for a new customer identified by his name and according to a modality for the address provided
    void
    alerter(String message)
    Method which sends the message passed as a parameter to all subscribers according to the method they have chosen.
    String[]
    getListeInscrits()
    Method which returns in the form of an array of channels the list of subscribers according to the format for each string: “NomDuClient (modeChoisi)”
    void
    retirer(String clientName)
    Method which withdraws membership from the alert service for the named customer if he is a member, otherwise displays a message of error.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Server Constructor: Initializes the subscriber storage structure

  • Method Details

    • adherer

      public void adherer(String clientName, String mode, String adr)
      Method which adds a subscription for a new customer identified by his name and according to a modality for the address provided
      Parameters:
      clientName - name of the client
      mode - communication mode chosen by the subscriber
      adr - address of the subscriber

    • retirer

      public void retirer(String clientName)
      Method which withdraws membership from the alert service for the named customer if he is a member, otherwise displays a message of error.
      Parameters:
      clientName - name of the client

    • alerter

      public void alerter(String message)
      Method which sends the message passed as a parameter to all subscribers according to the method they have chosen.
      Parameters:
      message - message sent to everyone

    • getListeInscrits

      public String[] getListeInscrits()
      Method which returns in the form of an array of channels the list of subscribers according to the format for each string: “NomDuClient (modeChoisi)”
      Returns:
      The list of subscribers
